entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
